name: PhotoSplash 2
author: QooQee.com
description:
The PhotoSplash v.2 plugin gives you access to the Unsplash collection of over 1,300,000 beautiful, copyright-free images from over 160,000 contributing photographers, all directly within Adobe XD.
Subject to QooQee Terms & Privacy Policy.

Terms: qooqee.com/terms
Policy: qooqee.com/policy
releaseNotes:
𝗜𝗠𝗔𝗚𝗘 𝗖𝗥𝗘𝗔𝗧𝗜𝗢𝗡
Generating elements from the selected photo/s by the dimensions you pick.

𝗣𝗔𝗚𝗘 𝗡𝗔𝗩𝗜𝗚𝗔𝗧𝗜𝗢𝗡
Navigate through pages on the image results.

𝗠𝗨𝗟𝗧𝗜-𝗟𝗘𝗩𝗘𝗟 𝗚𝗥𝗢𝗨𝗣𝗦
Apply to groups and all the elements within.

𝗔𝗗𝗩𝗔𝗡𝗖𝗘𝗗 𝗦𝗘𝗔𝗥𝗖𝗛
You can choose to have random results for a specific search parameter.

𝗡𝗘𝗪 𝗠𝗘𝗡𝗨 𝗣𝗔𝗡𝗘𝗟
Easy access to quality selection, settings, and source selection through one single menu.

𝗙𝗔𝗦𝗧𝗘𝗥 𝗔𝗡𝗗 𝗠𝗢𝗥𝗘 𝗩𝗘𝗥𝗦𝗔𝗧𝗜𝗟𝗘
We made it from scratch to make it better, faster and errorless. Now it works at least 1.5x faster than version 1.
